name: A.H.P.T. (Autonomous Human Protection Technology)
description:
A.H.P.T. (Autonomous Human Protection Technology) is a short  game where you play as the operator of a nanobot on a mission to help a host body fight off illness.

I created this game for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 1) that had the theme of “Minimalism”. I incorporated minimalism by using a small color pallet and simple controls. The jam also gave three bonus challenges that I tried to add in various ways.
